name: Explode, Create!
description:
A Third Person Shooter/3D Platformer, where your gun creates platforms instead of causing destruction. Use this to traverse through the geometric landscape. Collect Dead Matter (glowing cubes) , in order to keep your gun charged!

 Note: Press Keyboard Number 1 to remove save data on checkpoints!!

Used iTween during development of this game: http://www.pixelplacement.com/itween/index.php

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans+Condensed

Controls:  Xbox Controller (Preferred for Optimal Experience) 
  • Left Analog Move Character 
  • X Button - Shoot Bullet 
  • A Button - Jump 
  • Y Button -Dash

Keyboard

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space  - Jump 
  • Left Mouse Click - Shoot Bullet
  • E - Dash

A windows executable is attached below if there are problems with the web build!
